io.github.daveho.funwithsound

Class MonoSynthUGen2

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.beadsproject.beads.core.Bead
      • net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGen
        • net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGenChain
          • io.github.daveho.funwithsound.MonoSynthUGen2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParamNames, net.beadsproject.beads.data.DataBeadReceiver

    public class MonoSynthUGen2
extends net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGenChain
implements ParamNames, net.beadsproject.beads.data.DataBeadReceiver
    Modular monosynth UGen. Can be customized using Voice and NoteEnvelope objects. Each rendered note consists of arbitrary multiples of the base note frequency, each with an arbitrary static gain. Accepts parameter configuration via a DataBead.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • MonoSynthUGen2

        public MonoSynthUGen2(net.beadsproject.beads.core.AudioContext ac,
                      SynthToolkit toolkit,
                      net.beadsproject.beads.data.DataBead params,
                      double[] freqMult,
                      double[] oscGains)
        Constructor. The synth will play multiple frequencies when a note is played. Each frequency has a specified static gain.
        Parameters:
        ac - the AudioContext
        toolkit - the SynthToolkit to use to create voices, note envelope, etc.
        params - parameters to control attack/decay, glide time, etc.
        freqMult - create voices to play these multiples of the note frequency
        oscGains - the gains for each oscillator
